about_the_game:
Backrooms Of Reality is an atmospheric game with horror elements based on creepypasta /meme Backrooms.
You play the role of a new office worker of some mysterious large company. The strange events of the first day of work take us to the backrooms, the endless corridors on the verge of our reality.


Key Features:

Gameplay: Singleplayer. Mainly a "walking / running simulator". with puzzle and horror elements and a bit of story in the background.

Playing time: approx. 1-2 hours depending on the player.

Enemies: You can meet 2-3 enemies in the game. Some events are scriptable, others are random, so you never know what's lurking around the corner.

Immersive: Atmospheric, photorealistic graphics enhance your horror experience.

Controls: Mouse and keyboard

Saving: The game does not have a save system, but you unlock new chapters (levels) during the gameplay. Once unlocked, you'll be able to access these chapters from the main menu.

Multiple Endings: There are 3 endings (and endless endings if you get lost in backrooms)




Licensing:
Some content relating to the Backrooms is licensed under Creative Commons ShareAlike 3.0 – the base concepts originates from the Backrooms Wiki and Backrooms fandom and its authors. Backrooms Of Reality being partly derived from this content, is released under Creative Commons ShareAlike 3.0 The source files of Unreal Engine 4 and all other third party software are the properties of their respective owners and not released under CC-BY SA. In addition, certain third-party and first-party assets are the properties of their creators and not released under CC-BY SA.

Enemies: You can meet 2-3 enemies in the game. Some events are scriptable, others are random, so you never know what's lurking around the corner.

name: Backrooms of Reality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 / AMD FX-8350 2.1 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: anything
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change in the final release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 / AMD FX-8350 2.1 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: anything
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change in the final release

short_description: A game in which you navigate through backrooms' mazes and solving simple environmental puzzles. Sometimes you may encounter some creatures that live there. The game contains horror elements.
